title: Metro 2034 (Last Light) by Dmitry Glukhovsky [ENGLISH]
description: Metro 2034 (Russian: ÃÅ“ÃÂµÃ‘â€šÃ‘â‚¬ÃÂ¾ 2034) is a novel written by Russian author Dmitry Glukhovsky and is a sequel to the novel Metro 2033 by Glukhovsky. Although Metro 2034 is the official continuation of the Metro 2033 storyline, the 2013 video game Metro: Last Light - the sequel to the video game adaptation of the original novel - will have little to no similarities to the novel in its plot, but some events that are mentioned in the book may appear in the game also.
